HTML
The language for building web pages
HTMLni o'rganish HTML havolalari
HTMLga misol:
<!DOCTYPE
html
>
<html>
< title>
HTML Tutorial
</title>
<body>


<h1>
This is a heading
</h1>
<p>
This is a paragraph
</p>


</body>
</html>
CSS
The language for styling web pages
CSSni o'rganish CSS havolalari
CCSga misol:
body
{

background-color
:
lightblue
;

}


h1
{

color
:
white
;

text-align
:
center

}


p
{

font-family
:
verdana
;

font-size
:
20px

}
JavaScript
The language for programming web pages
JavaScriptni o'rganish JavaScript havolalari
JavaScriptga misol:
<button onclick ="myFunction()">
Click Me!
</button>

<script>
function myFunction() {
var
x = document.getElementById(
"demo"
);

x.style.fontSize =
"25px"
;

x.style.color =
"red"
;

}

<
/script
>
